text.value: Within 24 hours (check this box if facility delivery)

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Patient must be a female of child bearing age

bind.calculate: concat( concat( /delivery/patient_age_in_years , if( /delivery/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /delivery/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /delivery/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Date cannot be in the future and older than a month from today
Number of babies delivered should be more than zero
The number of babies alive can not be more than the number of babies delivered
Date cannot be in the future and older than a month from today
Date can not be in the past
Date cannot be in the future and older than a month from today
Enter a valid name starting with a capital letter

bind.calculate: if(( /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_infected_umbilical_cord = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_infected_convulsions = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_infected_feeding_difficulty = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_vomits_everything = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_drowsy = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_body_stiffness = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_yellow_skin = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_fever = 'yes' or /delivery/group_baby_condition/child_repeat/child_profile/baby_danger_sign_blue_skin = 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: The None option can not be selected with another option

If babies were delivered, you will have the chance to report on them next.
Please refer the woman to the health facility for PNC services

input.label: Please counsel the family and refer the child to the nearest health center where the baby can be immunized.

input.label: Does the baby have any of the following danger signs?
Refer to the health facility immediately

input.label: It is important to ensure that all pregnant women in your area have optimal nutrition status. This is assessed by using a MUAC tape
Use your MUAC tape to take the woman's MUAC

input.label: Refer to the health facility for further management

Did complete the last follow up visit?

input.label: Thank you. Tasks for nutrition follow up will be sent when due

select1.label: Have you referred to the health facility

input.label: Lactating mothers should eat a variety of foods, especially extra fluids, fruits, and vegetables, to feed their baby well
Counsel the woman on importance of exclusive breastfeeding
Breast milk provides the ideal nutrition for infants
Breast milk contains antibodies that help your baby fight off infection
Breast milk promotes a healthy weight
To keep the baby warm, use kangaroo mother care, wrap the baby with clothes and cover the head, and keep the baby in a warm room
Always sleep with the baby under a long-lasting insecticide treated net (LLIN)
Keep the baby's umbilical cord clean and dry
The MoH recommends PNC visits within 24 hours and in 7 days, and 6 weeks from date of delivery
